heroSection.title: Manage your finances smartly
heroSection.description: Comprehensive tool for controlling budget, tracking assets and achieving financial goals.

ctaSection.title: Ready to take control of your finances?
ctaSection.description: Join thousands of users who already use our app and achieve their financial goals.

howItWorksSection.title: How it works?
howItWorksSection.description: Managing finances has never been easier. Our app guides you through the process.
howItWorksSection.step1Description: Start by creating a budget, specifying the period and adding your income and planned expenses.
howItWorksSection.step2Description: Regularly add your expenses and income to have an up-to-date view of your finances.
howItWorksSection.step3Description: Set financial goals and save money systematically to achieve them in the planned time.

featuresSection.title: Everything you need to manage your finances
featuresSection.description: Our app offers a comprehensive set of tools that will help you control your finances, plan your expenses and achieve your financial goals.

feature1.title: Budgeting
feature1.description: Create and manage budgets, track your expenses and income, so you always have control over your finances.

feature2.title: Asset management
feature2.description: Monitor your assets and track changes in your net worth over time.

feature3.title: Financial goals
feature3.description: Set financial goals, monitor your progress and get notifications about upcoming deadlines.

feature4.title: Financial analysis
feature4.description: Analyze your expenses, income and debts to make better financial decisions.

feature5.title: Wallet system
feature5.description: Use the wallet system to effectively manage money designated for specific goals.

feature6.title: Iron reserve
feature6.description: Build and monitor your iron reserve to be prepared for unexpected expenses.

benefitsSection.title: Benefits of using the app
benefitsSection.description: Our app helps thousands of users better manage their finances and achieve their financial goals.

benefit1.title: Reduction of financial stress
benefit1.description: Planning and controlling finances reduces financial stress associated with uncertainty.

benefit2.title: Full control over finances
benefit2.description: You always know where your money goes and how much you can spend in a given period.

benefit3.title: Achieving financial goals
benefit3.description: Systematic saving and monitoring progress helps in achieving financial goals.

benefit4.title: Better financial decisions
benefit4.description: Analysis of expenses and income helps make better financial decisions.

subscription.title: Your subscription for - {familyName}

subscription.trialDescription: The trial period lasts 7 days and will end on {date}

structure.financialCushionDetailedInfo: Financial cushion, in this category should be assets that are most liquid and can be easily converted to money.
structure.livingAssetsDetailedInfo: Living assets, in this category should be assets that are used for daily life, such as a house or a car.
structure.investmentAssetsDetailedInfo: Investment assets, in this category should be assets that are invested for a longer future, such as stocks or bonds.
structure.otherAssetsDetailedInfo: Other assets, in this category should be assets that do not fit into other categories, such as collections or jewelry.

assets.title: Assets
assets.assetsAdditionalInfo: Assets are all your financial resources, such as: money in the bank account, stocks, bonds, real estate and other investments.

noAssetsCard.title: You don't have any assets yet
noAssetsCard.description: Add asset to control your fortune.

addAsset.title: Add asset
addAsset.description: Add asset to your list of assets.

editAsset.title: Edit asset
editAsset.description: Edit asset to your list of assets.

deleteAsset.title: Delete asset
deleteAsset.description: If you added the asset by mistake and want to delete it together with the history, so that there are no traces left -
deleteAsset.totalDeleteDescription: If you want to delete the asset completely, it may disrupt the history of your account. If you simply reduced it to zero, use the regular delete option.

debts.title: Debts
debts.additionalInfo: Debts are all your financial obligations, for example: the remaining amount of the loan together with interest.

noDebtsCard.title: You don't have any debts yet
noDebtsCard.description: Add debt to control your fortune.

addDebt.title: Add debt
addDebt.description: Add debt to your list of debts.

editDebt.title: Edit debt
editDebt.description: Edit debt from your list of debts.

deleteDebt.title: Delete debt
deleteDebt.description: If you added the debt by mistake and want to delete it together with the history, so that there are no traces left -
deleteDebt.totalDeleteDescription: If you want to delete the debt completely, it may disrupt the history of your account. If you simply reduced it to zero, use the regular delete option.

noGoalsCard.title: You don't have any goals yet
noGoalsCard.description: Add goal to your list of goals, to track your financial goals.

scheduleDialog.title: Deposit schedule - {goalName}
scheduleDialog.description: Here you can see the deposit schedule for the goal.

addGoal.title: Add new goal
addGoal.description: Add new goal to your list of goals.

valueField.label: Goal amount
valueField.additionalInfo: This field specifies the amount you want to achieve. Include the amount you have already saved.

dateField.label: Planned completion date
dateField.errorMustBeInTheFuture: Date must be in the future.
dateField.additionalInfo: This field specifies the date by which you want to achieve the goal. The goal will be planned in your budget so that you can achieve it by that date.

savingIntervalField.label: Deposit frequency
savingIntervalField.additionalInfo: This field specifies the frequency of the goal. For example, if you select "monthly", then a monthly expense will be added to your budget.

initialDepositField.label: Initial deposit
initialDepositField.additionalInfo: This field specifies the amount you have already saved for the goal.

editGoal.title: Edit goal
editGoal.description: Edit goal from your list of goals.

valueField.label: Goal amount
valueField.additionalInfo: This field specifies the amount you want to achieve. Include the amount you have already saved.

dateField.label: Date
dateField.additionalInfo: This field specifies the date by which you want to achieve the goal. The goal will be planned in your budget so that you can achieve it by that date.

savingIntervalField.label: Saving interval
savingIntervalField.additionalInfo: This field specifies the frequency of the goal. For example, if you select "monthly", then a monthly expense will be added to your budget.

initialDepositField.label: Initial deposit
initialDepositField.additionalInfo: This field specifies the amount you have already saved for the goal.

deleteGoal.title: Delete goal
deleteGoal.description: Delete goal from your list of goals. All expenses from previous budget periods will be deleted, which may affect your account history. If you do not want to affect the account history, simply delete the future expenses.

finishGoal.title: Finish goal
finishGoal.description: Finish goal from your list of goals.

editGoalOutcome.title: Edit goal outcome
editGoalOutcome.description: Edit goal outcome from your list of goals.

fortune.assetsAdditionalInfo: Assets are all your financial resources, such as: money in the bank account, stocks, bonds, real estate and other investments.
fortune.debtsAdditionalInfo: Debts are all your financial obligations, for example: the remaining amount of the loan together with interest.

goalsSummaryCard.title: Goals
goalsSummaryCard.noGoals: You don't have any goals yet

financialCushion.title: Financial cushion
financialCushion.description1: Poduszka finansowa powinna stanowić 3-6 miesięcznych wydatków, aby zapewnić bezpieczeństwo finansowe w przypadku sytuacji losowych. Aktualnie posiadasz
financialCushion.description3: of the recommended value. For the calculation of the percentage of the recommended value, we assume that the financial cushion is 6 times the monthly expenses.

settings.noProfilesCardTitle: You don't have any family profile yet
settings.noProfilesCardDescription: Add family profile, to control budget, track assets and achieve your financial goals.

received.title: Family profile invitations
received.noInvitationsDescription: You don't have any invitations yet.

reject.title: Reject invitation
reject.description: Are you sure you want to reject this invitation?

sent.noInvitationsDescription: You don't have any invitations yet.
sent.title: Sent invitations

addFamily.title: Create new family profile
addFamily.description: Family profile allows you to manage finances together with other people.

budgetIntervalField.label: Budget interval
budgetIntervalField.additionalInfo: This field allows you to configure how often a new budget should be opened, i.e. in which time frames we will summarize your expenses and incomes.

budgetTransferPouchBalanceField.label: Transfer wallet balance between budgets
budgetTransferPouchBalanceField.additionalInfo: This field allows you to configure whether the balance of wallets should be transferred to the next budget after the budget period. In case of choosing "yes", if you spend more than planned on a goal (e.g. shopping) in a given month, the wallet in the next month will be decreased by that amount. It will also work in reverse - if you do not spend the planned amount, the balance will be increased in the next month.

budgetStartDateField.label: Start date of the first budget period
budgetStartDateField.additionalInfo: This field allows you to configure which day a new budget period will be opened. In most cases, the best option will be the 1st day of the month, when you start using the application.

leaveFamily.title: Leave family
leaveFamily.description: Are you sure you want to leave this family?

inviteUserToFamily.title: Invite user to family
inviteUserToFamily.description: Provide email of the person you want to invite to {familyName} family profile.

removeFamily.title: Remove family
removeFamily.description: Are you sure you want to remove this family?

removeUserFromFamily.title: Remove user from family
removeUserFromFamily.description: Are you sure you want to remove this user from this family?

budget.title: Budget
budget.summaryAdditionalInfo: This tab is used to configure your budget. You can add your income, expenses and recurring wallets, and thus configure future budgets so that you do not have to add them again for each new budget period (for example, every month). You can also see all the things you have added, not just those from the current budget, which allows for a complete overview.
budget.budgetItemsAdditionalInfo: This tab is used to configure your budget. You can add your income, expenses and recurring wallets, and thus configure future budgets so that you do not have to add them again for each new budget period (for example, every month). You can also see all the things you have added, not just those from the current budget, which allows for a complete overview.

noFamilyCard.title: You don't have any family profile yet
noFamilyCard.description: Add family profile, to control budget, track assets and achieve your financial goals.

pouch.title: Wallets
pouch.additionalInfo: Wallets are a special type of expenses. Wallet has a planned capacity, but it is not added to the sum of expenses immediately, but as you add expenses to it. A good example of using wallets is such expenses as shopping - you can plan the amount you want to spend on shopping in a given month, but only the amount you actually spent (the sum of expenses added to this wallet in a given month) will be added to the budget balance. In the budget settings, you can set the option to transfer the wallet balance. This means that if you spend more than planned in a given month, the planned amount for the next month will be reduced by that amount. It will also work in reverse - if you do not spend all the planned amount, the excess will be transferred to the next wallet.

noPouchesCard.title: You don't have any wallets yet
noPouchesCard.description: Add wallets, to control budget, track assets and achieve your financial goals.

budgetSummary.title: Wallets
budgetSummary.listOfPouches: Total amount of wallets in the budget period.
budgetSummary.seeFullList: Click to see the list of expenses in this wallet

removePouchOutcome.title: Remove expense from wallet
removePouchOutcome.description: Are you sure you want to remove this expense from wallet? This operation cannot be undone.

editPouchOutcome.title: Edit expense in wallet
editPouchOutcome.description: Edit expense in wallet, to control budget, track assets and achieve your financial goals.

removePouch.title: Remove wallet
removePouch.descriptionOneTime: Are you sure you want to remove this wallet? This operation cannot be undone.
removePouch.descriptionMultiple: Are you sure you want to remove this wallet? This operation cannot be undone, and it may affect your account history, such as changing the current or past budget balance.

addPouchOutcome.title: Add expense to wallet
addPouchOutcome.description: Select wallet and add expense in its scope, to control budget, track assets and achieve your financial goals.

addPouch.title: Create new wallet
addPouch.description: Add wallets, to control budget, track assets and achieve your financial goals.

dateField.label: Date
dateField.additionalInfo: This field specifies the date of occurrence. If you selected that it should be a recurring occurrence, this date specifies the first occurrence.

recurrenceField.label: Recurrence
recurrenceField.additionalInfo: This field allows you to configure recurrence. If something occurs only once, select "one-time". If something occurs multiple times, select "recurring" and specify how often it should occur. In the case of selecting the recurring option, you must configure how many times and how often it should occur.

editPouch.title: Edit wallet
editPouch.description: Unfortunately, due to the correctness of the history of your wallets, not all fields can be changed. To fully edit the wallet, use the option to stop the wallet or delete the wallet, and then create a new one.

dateField.label: Creation date
dateField.additionalInfo: This field specifies the date of occurrence. If you selected that it should be a recurring occurrence, this date specifies the first occurrence.

stopPouch.title: Stop wallet
stopPouch.descriptionAttentionStop: Stopping the wallet, it will not be included in the budget from the date you provide.
stopPouch.descriptionAttentionStopPouch: Stopping the wallet, it will not be included in the budget from the date you provide.
stopPouch.descriptionDeleteTitle: If you want to completely delete the wallet,
stopPouch.descriptionDeleteAttention: Remember that completely deleting the wallet may cause changes in the balances of the current and past budgets.

outcomes.title: Expenses
outcomes.additionalInfo: Expenses are a category, to which you should add all expenses, for which you know that you will spend a specific amount, for example: loan installment or rent. If you do not know how much the expense will be, and you only plan to spend a certain amount on a certain goal, use the wallet.

outcomeCard.goalOutcomeChangeInfo: Changes in expenses on goals are possible from the goals page

noOutcomesCard.title: You have no expenses yet
noOutcomesCard.description: Add expenses to control your budget, track assets and achieve your financial goals.

removeOutcome.title: Remove expense
removeOutcome.descriptionOneTime: Are you sure you want to remove this expense? This operation cannot be undone.
removeOutcome.descriptionMultiple: Are you sure you want to remove this expense? This operation cannot be undone, and it may affect your account history, such as changing the current or past budget balance.

editOutcome.title: Edit expense
editOutcome.description: Unfortunately, due to the correctness of the history of your expenses, not all fields can be changed. To fully edit the expense, use the option to stop the expense or delete the expense, and then create a new one.

dateField.label: Date
dateField.additionalInfo: This field specifies the date of occurrence. If you selected that it should be a recurring occurrence, this date specifies the first occurrence.

addOutcome.title: Create new expense
addOutcome.description: Add expenses to control your budget, track assets and achieve your financial goals.

dateField.label: Date
dateField.additionalInfo: This field specifies the date of occurrence. If you selected that it should be a recurring occurrence, this date specifies the first occurrence.

recurrenceField.label: Repeat every
recurrenceField.additionalInfo: This field allows you to configure recurrence. If something occurs only once, select "one-time". If something occurs multiple times, select "recurring" and specify how often it should occur. In the case of selecting the recurring option, you must configure how many times and how often it should occur.

stopOutcome.title: Stop expense
stopOutcome.descriptionAttentionStop: Stopping the expense, it will not be included in the budget from the date you provide.
stopOutcome.descriptionDeleteTitle: If you want to completely delete the expense,
stopOutcome.descriptionDeleteAttention: Remember that completely deleting the expense may cause changes in the balances of the current and past budgets.

incomes.title: Incomes
incomes.additionalInfo: To incomes add all the inflows that replenish your budget. If the income is recurring, like a salary, add a recurring income. If the income is one-time, like a bonus, add a one-time income. You can also add a multiple income, if you know that it will occur a specific number of times.

stopIncome.title: Stop income
stopIncome.descriptionAttentionStop: Stopping the income, it will not be included in the budget from the date you provide.
stopIncome.descriptionDeleteTitle: If you want to completely delete the income,
stopIncome.descriptionDeleteAttention: Remember that completely deleting the income may cause changes in the balances of the current and past budgets.

noIncomesCard.title: You have no incomes yet
noIncomesCard.description: Add income to control your budget, track assets and achieve your financial goals.

removeIncome.title: Remove income
removeIncome.description: Are you sure you want to delete the income? This operation cannot be undone, and it may affect your account history, such as changing the current or past budget balance.

addIncome.title: Create new income
addIncome.description: Add income to control your budget, track assets and achieve your financial goals.

dateField.label: Date
dateField.additionalInfo: This field specifies the date of occurrence. If you selected that it should be a recurring occurrence, this date specifies the first occurrence.

recurrenceField.label: Repeat every
recurrenceField.additionalInfo: This field allows you to configure recurrence. If something occurs only once, select "one-time". If something occurs multiple times, select "recurring" and specify how often it should occur. In the case of selecting the recurring option, you must configure how many times and how often it should occur.

editIncome.title: Edit income
editIncome.description: Unfortunately, due to the correctness of the history of your incomes, not all fields can be changed. To fully edit the income, use the option to stop the income or delete the income, and then create a new one.

dateField.label: Date
dateField.additionalInfo: This field specifies the date of occurrence. If you selected that it should be a recurring occurrence, this date specifies the first occurrence.

recurrenceField.label: Repeat every
recurrenceField.additionalInfo: This field specifies the frequency of occurrence. For example, if you select "every month", then every month the income for this purpose will be added to your budget.

budgetSummary.currentBudgetBalance: Balance with planned expenses in wallets

budgetSettings.title: Budget settings
budgetSettings.description: Change budget settings to match your needs.

intervalField.label: Interval
intervalField.additionalInfo: This field allows you to configure how often the budget should be opened. In other words, in what time intervals we will summarize your expenses and incomes.

startDateField.label: Start date
startDateField.additionalInfo: This field allows you to configure the date of the first budget period. In most cases, the best option will be the 1st day of the month, in which you start using the application.

transferPouchBalanceField.label: Transfer wallet balance
transferPouchBalanceField.additionalInfo: This field allows you to configure whether the balance in the wallet should be transferred to the next budget after the budget period ends. In the case of selecting the "yes" option, if you spend more than planned on a particular purpose (e.g. shopping) in a given month, the wallet in the next month will be reduced by that amount. This will also work in reverse - if you do not spend the planned amount, the balance in the next month will be increased by that amount.

tour.title: Welcome to the application
tour.description: This is the tour of the application. It will help you understand the application and start using it. You can skip it now, and start it at any time from the settings screen.

addFamily.title: Add your family
addFamily.description: The first step is to add a family, it is a profile that will be shared with other users and will allow for joint management of finances. To control the tour, use the buttons below or the arrows on the keyboard.
addFamily.alert: You must add at least one family, to continue

families.title: Family card
families.description: This is your family card, it contains information about the family and the ability to manage it. You can be a member of several families at the same time, to switch between them, use the button in the upper right corner of the card, it is not visible on this card because it is currently selected.

familyEdit.title: Family edit
familyEdit.description: This button will open the family edit panel, in which you can change the family name, time zone and currency.

familyDelete.title: Family delete
familyDelete.description: This button will open the family delete panel, in which you can delete the family. You can also delete the family from the settings screen.

inviteUserToFamily.title: Invite user to family
inviteUserToFamily.description: This button will open the family invite panel, in which you can invite a user to the family. You can also invite a user to the family from the settings screen.

yourFamilyInvitations.title: Sent invitations
yourFamilyInvitations.description: Here you will see the invitations to your family sent by you

familyInvitations.title: Received invitations
familyInvitations.description: Here you will see the invitations to your family received from other users

goToBudgetPage.title: Go to budget page
goToBudgetPage.description: To discover the next features of the application, go to the budget page.

budgetSettings.title: Budget settings
budgetSettings.description: This button opens the budget settings window, where you can set the start day of the new budget and how often the new budget should start, there is also an option to transfer the balance of wallets to the next budgets, you can learn more about it by clicking the "i" icon next to the field where you can select this option.

budgetItems.title: Go to budget items
budgetItems.description: To configure your expenses and incomes, go to the budget items page.

addIncome.title: Add new income
addIncome.description: Add your first income, select if it is one time or recurring and enter its amount
addIncome.alert: You must add at least one income, to continue

seeThisIncome.title: Income card
seeThisIncome.description: This is the income card, it contains information about the income, its amount, whether it is one time or recurring, there are also options for editing and deleting, however, be careful with deleting recurring incomes, it may affect previous budgets, so when a recurring income stops, simply stop it so that the history of your budgets is not changed.

addOutcome.title: Add new expense
addOutcome.description: Add your first expense, select if it is one time or recurring and enter its amount
addOutcome.alert: You must add at least one expense, to continue

seeThisOutcome.title: Expense card
seeThisOutcome.description: This is the expense card, it contains information about the expense, its amount, whether it is one time or recurring, there are also options for editing and deleting, however, be careful with deleting recurring expenses, it may affect previous budgets, so when a recurring expense stops, simply stop it so that the history of your budgets is not changed.

addPouch.title: Add new wallet
addPouch.description: Add your first wallet, wallet is a special type of expense, which can be used to control the budget, allows you to select the amount of money you want to allocate to a specific purpose, for example, food, and then during the budget period, add individual expenses within this wallet, so that you can exactly know how much money we spent on a specific purpose during the budget period. If you selected the option of transferring the balances of wallets, then if you do not spend all the money in the given period, the missing amount will be transferred to the next one, similarly, when you spend more on a specific purpose in the given period.
addPouch.alert: You must add at least one wallet, to continue

seeThisPouch.title: Wallet card
seeThisPouch.description: This is the wallet card, it contains information about the wallet, its amount, whether it is one time or recurring, there are also options for editing and deleting, however, be careful with deleting wallets, it may affect previous budgets, so when a wallet stops, simply stop it so that the history of your budgets is not changed.

goToBudgetSummary.title: Go to budget summary
goToBudgetSummary.description: Go to budget summary, you will see there the current budget period based on the data you have added in this period

seeBudgetTimeline.title: See budget timeline
seeBudgetTimeline.description: Here you can see from when to when the current budget period is

seeBudgetBalance.title: See budget balance
seeBudgetBalance.description: This card shows your balance in the current budget period, you can compare how much you have in income and expenses in the given period, calculating with the expenses you have made in wallets, but also with the balance calculated with all planned expenses and incomes

budgetPouches.title: Budget wallets
budgetPouches.description: This card shows the summary of all wallets, you can see how much was spent in this period, and how much expenses in wallets are planned in this budget period.

pouchOutcome.title: Wallet card
pouchOutcome.description: As I mentioned earlier, wallet is a special type of container for expenses, wallet has its own capacity. Thanks to this button, you can add an expense within a wallet, add an expense now, then you can delete it.
pouchOutcome.alert: You must add at least one expense within a wallet, to continue

pouchOutcomesList.title: List of expenses in wallet
pouchOutcomesList.description: Expenses within a wallet can be viewed here in the form of a list, expand this list to see which expenses were added within this wallet.
pouchOutcomesList.alert: You must expand the list of expenses in the wallet, to continue

pouchOutcomeEdit.title: Manage expenses in wallet
pouchOutcomeEdit.description: Each expense can be edited and deleted, to do this, use the highlighted buttons.

incomesList.title: List of incomes
incomesList.description: Here you can see the incomes that occurred in the current budget period.

outcomesList.title: List of expenses
outcomesList.description: Here you can see the expenses that occurred in the current budget period.

goToGoalsPage.title: Go to goals page
goToGoalsPage.description: To discover the next features of the application, go to the goals page.

addGoal.title: Add new goal
addGoal.description: Add a new goal, select its name, amount you already have, amount you need, how often you want to save and until when you want to achieve this goal. After adding the goal, expenses on this goal will be automatically included in the budget.
addGoal.alert: You must add at least one goal, to continue

seeThisGoal.title: Goal card
seeThisGoal.description: This is the goal card, it contains information about the goal, its amount and progress. The highlighted button is used to view the savings schedule. You can edit the goal expense in the given period if you saved more, or if you did not save the planned amount, future goal expenses will be automatically updated so that you can achieve the set goal.

editGoal.title: Edit goal
editGoal.description: You can also edit the goal, complete it, or delete it if you added it by mistake.

goToFortunePage.title: Go to fortune page
goToFortunePage.description: To discover the next features of the application, go to the fortune page.

addFirstAsset.title: Add new asset
addFirstAsset.description: Now add your first asset, it can be a house, cash, or stocks.
addFirstAsset.alert: You must add at least one asset, to continue

seeThisAsset.title: Asset card
seeThisAsset.description: This is the asset card, you can edit and delete it, to do this, use the highlighted buttons. You need to update the value of each asset periodically to know exactly how much your net worth is at any given time.

addFirstDebt.title: Add new debt
addFirstDebt.description: Add your first debt, it can be a mortgage, or a loan.
addFirstDebt.alert: You must add at least one debt, to continue

seeThisDebt.title: Debt card
seeThisDebt.description: This is the debt card, you can edit and delete it, to do this, use the highlighted buttons. You need to update the value of each debt periodically to know exactly how much your net worth is at any given time.

seeAssetsCountCard.title: Assets card
seeAssetsCountCard.description: This is the assets card, it contains information about the value of all your assets.

seeDebtsCountCard.title: Debts card
seeDebtsCountCard.description: This is the debts card, it contains information about the value of all your debts.

seeNetWorthCard.title: Net worth card
seeNetWorthCard.description: This is the net worth card, it contains information about the value of your net worth.

financialCushionCard.title: Financial cushion card
financialCushionCard.description: This is the financial cushion card, it contains information about the value of your financial cushion.

livingAssetsCard.title: Living assets card
livingAssetsCard.description: This is the living assets card, it contains information about the value of your living assets.

investmentsCard.description: This is the investments card, it contains information about the value of your investments.

othersAssetsCard.title: Others assets card
othersAssetsCard.description: This is the others assets card, it contains information about the value of your other assets.

goToDashboardPage.title: Go to dashboard page
goToDashboardPage.description: To discover the next features of the application, go to the dashboard page.

dashboardFortuneCard.title: Fortune card
dashboardFortuneCard.description: Here you can see the summary of your fortune.

dashboardBudgetBalanceCard.title: Budget balance card
dashboardBudgetBalanceCard.description: Here you can see the current balance of your budget.

dashboardHistoryOfFinancesCard.title: History of finances card
dashboardHistoryOfFinancesCard.description: Here you can see the history of your finances on this and previous budget periods.

dashboardGoalsCard.title: Goals card
dashboardGoalsCard.description: Here you can see your goals and monitor their progress.

dashboardFinancialCushionCard.title: Financial cushion card
dashboardFinancialCushionCard.description: Here you can see the current level of your financial cushion, the application will show you if it is on a safe level compared to your expenses
